item.title: Portswigger Business Logic Flows Writeups
item.author: krishnannavadia@gmail.com (g4nd1v)
item.description: 1. Lab: Excessive trust in client-side controls This lab doesn’t adequately validate user input. You can exploit a logic flaw in its purchasing workflow to buy items for an unintended price. To solve the lab, buy a “Lightweight l33t leather jacket”. You can log in to your own account using the following credentials: wiener:peter In this application, when we add items to cart, it is also sending the price as a parameter and consider that as the actual price instead of original price.
item.dc:creator: g4nd1v
